subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Mikko Ilonen of Finland and Tony Carolan of Australia shot five-under-par 67s to share a one-stroke first-round lead in the inaugural Ballantine’s Championship, the European tour’s first event in South Korea. The American Chris DiMarco was three strokes back. The South Korean star K. J. Choi and the former British Open champion Padraig Harrington opened with 71s.
